text: Harold Preciado (; born 1 June 1994) is a Colombian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Shenzhen. ==Club career== ==International career== Preciado was named in Colombia's provisional squad for Copa América Centenario but was cut from the final squad. Preciado played a vital role in Colombia's qualification to the Olympics and played every game in the Rio olympics. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |-
